data.title: Abhishek Giri, AffillEAust on LinkedIn: How to Help Someone Discover Work That Excites Them
data.meta_description: How to Help Someone Discover Work That Excites Them
data.text:
Members of the Ringwood Level Crossing Removal Project team were invited to speak with students from Ringwood Secondary College, providing insights into their career paths and what project work on Bedford Road, Ringwood and Dublin Road, Ringwood East entails. The session kicked off with an overview of the Level Crossing Removal Project, highlighting the different construction technologies and the different roles available across projects, with team members from engineering, environment, project management and communications discussing their roles and career progression. The students showed great interest in the project, keeping the speakers on their toes with questions about disruptions, rail infrastructure and heritage findings. The panel was held as part of a broader workshop at the Yarra Ranges Tech School - Box Hill Institute, which has worked with LXRP’s Industry Capability and Inclusion (ICI) team to deliver industry events. For more info on the Ringwood Level Crossing Removal Project, visit our website: https://bit.ly/3qBRaP0

Connecting the Dingley Bypass to the Mornington Peninsula Freeway and opening 4 weeks ahead of schedule, you can now use the new Mordialloc Freeway to hit the beautiful peninsula beaches this summer! Check out the video to learn how to access Victoria’s newest freeway from today. #Construction #Melbourne #Infrastructure #Transport #Engineer #ConstructionNews #Machinery #RoadSafety #Operations #Teamwork #Automotive #Management Kingston City Council, McConnell Dowell, DECMIL, City of Greater Dandenong, McConnell Dowell Decmil Joint Venture

In a first for the Southern Hemisphere, McConnell Dowell used horizontal directional drilling (HDD) to construct a shore crossing of bundled oil and gas pipelines under the surf zone, on Australia’s treacherous Bass Strait. Not only was this the first time this method of submarine pipeline construction had been undertaken in the Southern Hemisphere, it was also the first time in the world that the two pipes had been bundled together and directionally drilled simultaneously. It has been more than 30 years since these 'firsts’, and we are still improving on this HDD technology and continually looking for ways to bring innovation and efficiency to the projects we deliver.

It’s been one massive year since we started work to build the new Mordialloc Freeway, which will link the Mornington Peninsula Freeway and Dingley Bypass. More than 600,000 hours of work has been completed since October 2019 and it shows. Read more about what we’ve been up to: https://bit.ly/3kZP8R9 #Construction #Melbourne #Infrastructure #Transport #Engineer #ConstructionNews #Machinery #RoadSafety #Operations #Teamwork #Automotive #Management Kingston City Council, McConnell Dowell, DECMIL, City of Greater Dandenong, McConnell Dowell Decmil Joint Venture

Men are getting more and more comfortable embracing their identities as proud dads at work. We need to keep this momentum growing. This article featuring Alexis Ohanian is part of HBR's recent Big Idea program on gender equality. Subscribers - log in to explore the entire series today. https://trib.al/i8YxIwr
